trans-unit.source: Custom forms checking: Custom forms checking description

Access key: <input type='button' style='margin-top:5px;-webkit-border-bottom-left-radius: 5px;-webkit-border-bottom-right-radius: 5px;-webkit-border-radius: 5px;-webkit-border-top-left-radius: 5px;-webkit-border-top-right-radius: 5px;background: #3399FF;border-radius: 5px;box-sizing: border-box;color: #FFFFFF;font: normal normal 400 14px/16.2px "Open Sans";padding:3px;border:0px none;cursor:pointer;' value='Get access key automatically' onclick='location.href="?get_auto_key=1"'>
